text: allatu ivarukku oru putaiyal alikkappattirukka ventama? Allatu atiliruntu unpatarku (oru palat)tottam untakiyirukka ventama?" (Enrum kurukinranar) anriyum, inta aniyayak kararkal; (muhminkalai nokki)"cuniyam ceyyappatta oru manitaraiyeyanri, verevaraiyum ninkal pinparravillai" enrum kurukirarkal
